KxJRT
Class Mapper

java.lang.Object
  KxJRT.Mapper

public class Mapper
extends java.lang.Object

Mapper class performs an indirection between model indices and data source indices. This class is used by KxJModelInputMapper.
For example, let { 0:a1, 1:a2, 2:a3, 3:a4 } be the variables needed by the model to apply properly, and { 0:a2, 1:b1, 2:a4, 3:b2, 4:a3, 5:a1 } be the data source variables. This mapper then builds the following indirection :
{ 0:5, 1:0; 2:4, 3:2 }.
When the model asks for variable with index 1, ie a2, the mapper turns it into 0, which is a2's index in data source reference.

See Also:
IKxJModelInput, KxJModelInputMapper
